vsParam:
I gathered so many things today.
And all these are new to me. I'm so happy!

Looks like you've got used to the environment here!
Perhaps you can explore some places further away, right?
After all, you have your mission to accomplish here...

I got absorbed in getting used to life here, and totally
forgot that I must also upgrade my adventurer's level!

What? Upgrading your adventurer's level!?
I thought you were going to find your mother...

Ah, this is also relevant to finding my mother...
All adventurers shall be licensed.

Those stuck at a low level will see their licenses revoked. I must earn
evaluation points to upgrade my level by taking commissions...

I see...
Life is hard for adventurers too.

Hmm, if I'm stuck in this world for too long, I can't
accumulate enough points when I go back...

Then I can't be an adventurer anymore...
What should I do...

There... must be a way!
[px], calm down.

Yeah.
I also think so, although I can't give any guarantees.

Totori, you are also adventuring in this world, right?
So...

Your adventures in this world should be recognized when
you go back as long as you keep evidence of them, huh?

Ah, that's right! You look so honest.
Who'd know that you are actually so witty!

Just in time. I got a commission to kill a monster.
Monster-killing should be a common adventure, right?

Is it OK for you to start off by killing a monster?
Totori, what do you think?
N-no problem! I'll work hard and learn from you guys!

Here it is!
This guy is our target!

I-it looks fierce...
Can I defeat it...
We are alright! Let's do this together!

Huff... puff...
Wonderful! We killed it!

Look! This is the ingredient dropped from the monster!
It can be evidence, right?

Eh? T-Totori!?
Why are you shaking. Are you alright!?

Maybe... You are the type of persons with
a poor stamina?

Thank you... But I can barely stand.
That's so embarrassing...
Boohoo. I got that a lot...

Though I'm an adventurer, my stamina is very poor...
I always want to do something about this weakness...

I see. As an adventurer who lacks stamina,
you must have gone through lots of rough times...

Alright! If you want to improve your fitness and stamina,
join me in receiving training from Captain!

W-wait! You are talking about the Tandrion Training Method, huh?
No! I would never recommend that to you!

No means no! Just take your time in things
like improving your stamina!
